Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent;
Tool.Enabled = true
function hypnoBeam(lookAt) local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local hypnoSphere = Instance.new("Part") newDecal = Tool.HypnoTex:Clone() newDecal.Parent = hypnoSphere newDecal.Face = 0 newDecal = Tool.HypnoTex:Clone() newDecal.Parent = hypnoSphere newDecal.Face = 1 newDecal = Tool.HypnoTex:Clone() newDecal.Parent = hypnoSphere newDecal.Face = 2 newDecal = Tool.HypnoTex:Clone() newDecal.Parent = hypnoSphere newDecal.Face = 3 newDecal = Tool.HypnoTex:Clone() newDecal.Parent = hypnoSphere newDecal.Face = 4 newDecal = Tool.HypnoTex:Clone() newDecal.Parent = hypnoSphere newDecal.Face = 5
hypnoSphere.BackSurface = 0 hypnoSphere.BottomSurface = 0 hypnoSphere.FrontSurface = 0 hypnoSphere.LeftSurface = 0 hypnoSphere.TopSurface = 0 hypnoSphere.RightSurface = 0
hypnoSphere.Shape = 0 hypnoSphere.Size = Vector3.new(4,4,4) hypnoSphere.CFrame = CFrame.new(vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm").Position) hypnoSphere.CanCollide = false newBP = Instance.new("BodyPosition") newBP.position = vCharacter.Head.Position + lookAt*20 newBP.Parent = hypnoSphere m = hypnoSphere:GetMass() newBP.maxForce = Vector3.new(m*10,m*250,m*10) hypnoSphere.Parent = game.Workspace hypnoScript = script.HypnoScript:Clone() hypnoScript.Parent = hypnoSphere hypnoScript.Disabled = false
local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = hypnoSphere
hypnoScript.Disabled = false end
function gunUp() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,.196,-.981) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,.981,-.196) end
function gunOut() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,0,-1) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,1,0) end
function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (targetPos - character.Head.Position).unit
hypster = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("HypnoSound") if hypster == nil then hypster = Instance.new("Sound") hypster.Name = "HypnoSound" hypster.Volume = .8 hypster.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=35275837" hypster.Parent = Tool.Parent end
hypster2 = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("HypnoSound2") if hypster2 == nil then hypster2 = Instance.new("Sound") hypster2.Name = "HypnoSound2" hypster2.Volume = .8 hypster2.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=35275883" hypster2.Parent = Tool.Parent end
hypster:Play() hypster2:Play()
gunUp() hypnoBeam(lookAt) wait(.75) gunOut() wait(2.75) hypster2:Stop() Tool.Enabled = true end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated)

ball = script.Parent damage = 10
HitSound = Instance.new("Sound") HitSound.Name = "HitSound" HitSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=11945266" HitSound.Parent = ball HitSound.Volume = 1
function onTouched(hit) if hit == nil or hit.Parent == nil then return end local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid")
-- if humanoid ~= nil then -- tagHumanoid(humanoid) -- humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) -- untagHumanoid(humanoid) -- end
-- HitSound:Play() -- ball.Parent = nil --print("Hit Ground At: ") --print(ball.Position) --ball.Parent = nil end
--connection = ball.Touched:connect(onTouched)
function isNotCreator(target) name_tag = ball:findFirstChild("creator") if name_tag == nil then return false end if (target == name_tag.Value) then return false else return true end end
function sleepOpponent(distance, player) -- copy a whirlscreen if one is not there already whirlScreen = player.PlayerGui:FindFirstChild("WhirlScreen") if (whirlScreen == nil) then -- need to make a new whirlScreen whirlScreen = script:FindFirstChild("WhirlScreen") whirlScreen:Clone().Parent = player.PlayerGui end
whirlScript = player.PlayerGui:FindFirstChild("WhirlScript") if (whirlScript == nil) then firstWhirlScript = script:FindFirstChild("WhirlScript") whirlScript = firstWhirlScript:Clone() whirlScript.Parent = player.PlayerGui --whirlScript.Disabled = false end
if whirlScreen.WhirlStrength.Value > distance then
whirlScript.Disabled = false
-- reset the whirlscreen timer --whirlScreen.WhirlTimer.Value = 50 --in ms
-- set the whirlscreen strength whirlScreen.WhirlStrength.Value = distance
-- set the walking speed of the character -- will be done inside whirlScript
end
end
local rvChangeSpeed = 2 local anim = 0 local step = .1 for i = 1,50 do myPlayers = game.Players:GetPlayers()
-- sleep any players close enough who aren't the creator for j = 1, #myPlayers do -- if myPlayers[j] ~= nil then if isNotCreator(myPlayers[j]) then newDistance = myPlayers[j]:DistanceFromCharacter(ball.Position) if newDistance < 50 then sleepOpponent(newDistance, myPlayers[j]) end end -- end end
-- and also change spin directions ball.RotVelocity = ball.RotVelocity + Vector3.new((math.random()-.5)*rvChangeSpeed,(math.random()-.5)*rvChangeSpeed,(math.random()-.5)*rvChangeSpeed)
anim = anim + step if anim >= 1 or anim <= 0 then step = -step end --ball.Size = Vector3.new(3+anim, 3+anim, 3+anim) ball.Color = Color3.new(1-anim,1,1-anim) ball.Transparency = anim wait(0.1) end
--ball.SparkSound.Looped = false --ball.SparkSound:Stop()
-- get rid of the hypnoSphere ball.Parent = nil

print("Getting whirled!!")
--http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=34377700 = cake
splats = script:FindFirstChild("Splats") if splats == nil then splats = Instance.new("Sound") splats.Parent = script splats.Volume = 1 splats.Name = "Splats" splats.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=34376514" end
screen = script.Parent:FindFirstChild("WhirlScreen") if screen == nil then print("Could not find screen in PlayerGUI") end
whirl = screen:FindFirstChild("whirl") if whirl == nil then print("Whirl could not be found") end
--whirl.Visible = true
local vPlayer = screen.Parent.Parent humanoid = vPlayer.Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
--whirlTimer = screen.WhirlTimer whirlStrength = screen.WhirlStrength
local endSize = 2.5 local startSize = 1.2 local speed = .1
while true do local i = startSize local iStep = speed --while whirlTimer.Value > 1 do local needToKill = false
while whirlStrength.Value < 50 do needToKill = true whirl.Visible = true whirl.BackgroundTransparency = whirlStrength.Value/50 i = i+iStep whirl.Size = UDim2.new(i, 1, i, 1) whirl.Position = UDim2.new(.5-i/2, 0, .5-i/2, 0) --whirlTimer.Value = whirlTimer.Value - 1 whirlStrength.Value = whirlStrength.Value + .5 if humanoid ~= nil then humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16*whirlStrength.Value/50 end if i >= endSize then iStep = -speed end if i <= startSize then iStep = speed end wait(.1) end
if needToKill then --whirl.Position = UDim2.new(-1, 0, -1, 0) --whirl.Size = UDim2.new(0,5,0,5) -- expand screen a lot first whirl.BackgroundTransparency = 1 while i < 4 do i = i+speed whirl.Size = UDim2.new(i, 1, i, 1) whirl.Position = UDim2.new(.5-i/2, 0, .5-i/2, 0) wait(.1) end if humanoid ~= nil then humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end whirl.Visible = false end
wait(.5) end

local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end print("ending") enabled = false
while Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse To Wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
while not Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse to Go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png"
enabled = true end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)
